Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. define: Use this api to update items of the discount activity

error_list.name: discount.error_assigned_promo_stock
error_list.description: The reserved stock of added products or disabled products can't be edited

error_list.name: discount.item_status_abnormal
error_list.description: The item status is abnormal

error_list.name: discount.error_item_abnormal
error_list.description: The item is abnormal

error_list.name: discount.error_item_under_block_categories
error_list.description: This product is under a category that is prohibited from promotions due to regulations in your country

error_list.name: discount.fail_model_price_check
error_list.description: The difference between the maximum price and the minimum price in one item is too large.

error_list.name: discount.get_model_orgin_price_error
error_list.description: There are something wrong when get the original price of model, please try again.

error_list.name: discount.discount_is_end
error_list.description: The end discount cannot be updated or deleted.

error_list.name: discount.error_b2c_item_not_allowed
error_list.description: This product is a B2C product that is prohibited from promotions in FBS shops

error_list.name: discount.item_in_promotion_too_many
error_list.description: A maximum of 1000 items can be uploaded in one promotion

error_list.name: discount.item_in_promotion_too_many_whitelist
error_list.description: A maximum of 15,000 items can be uploaded in one promotion

error_list.name: discount.item_purchase_limit_error
error_list.description: Purchase limit of this product must be greater than {number}.

error_list.name: discount.item_need_model_id
error_list.description: Please input model id for the item with models.

error_list.name: discount.item_not_in_promotion
error_list.description: Item is not found in this discount.

error_list.name: discount.item_status_invalid
error_list.description: item status is invalid.

error_list.name: discount.item_id_not_exist
error_list.description: The Item id you provided is not found, please check your item id.

error_list.name: discount.item_id_repeated
error_list.description: The item id can't be upload due to it has duplicated.

error_list.name: discount.model_in_promotion_too_many
error_list.description: A maximum of 50,000 models can be uploaded in one promotion

error_list.name: discount.model_not_in_promotion
error_list.description: The model that you provided is not in this discount.

error_list.name: discount.model_id_not_exist
error_list.description: The model id you provided is not found. Please check your model id.

error_list.name: discount.model_id_repeated
error_list.description: The model id can't be upload due to it has duplicated.

error_list.name: discount.promotion_price_for_vn
error_list.description: The discount price has exceeded 50% of original price.

error_list.name: discount.promotoin_price_too_high
error_list.description: Discount price is greater than the maximum national amount.

error_list.name: discount.promotion_price_too_low
error_list.description: Discount price is less than the minimum national amount.

error_list.name: discount.item_exceed_discount_limit
error_list.description: The overall item level promotion limit has been reached.

error_list.name: discount.error_update_admin_discount
error_list.description: The discount created by admin can't be edited

error_list.name: discount.error_update_streaming_discount
error_list.description: The discount created by livestreaming can't be edited

error_list.name: discount.exceed_discount_item_batch_size
error_list.description: You can only add up to 50 items at a time.
